notes: Cover title: Museum of the Mad!

SUMMARY: The Glob, Man-Thing and The Hulk have been captured by The Collector for his private spaceship/ museum; The Hulk leads a revolt of the exhibits, who have been held for many years, but upon leaving the museum age catches up with them and they crumble.
